snippet: Among the factors cited for the significant drop in the number of tourists this year to China were smog, the sluggish global economy, a stronger Chinese currency and the bird flu.
lead_paragraph: Among the factors cited for the significant drop in the number of tourists this year to China were smog, the sluggish global economy, a stronger Chinese currency and the bird flu.

headline.main: China: Foreign Tourism Falls, and Smog May Be One Reason
headline.print_headline: China: Foreign Tourism Falls, And Smog May Be One Reason
